articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill.
					 He, to begin with, went round varieties of bags for students made with bag cloth produced at the mill.
					
					 The longer one sees bags for students, the more fashionable they look, he said, adding their styles and colors are diverse and can match ones of other countries in all aspects such as convenience, usage and beauty. 
					
					 He looked round the newly built bag cloth production process.
					
					 Noting with great satisfaction that the process is the locally manufactured production process, Korean style production process desired by the Workers' Party of Korea, he said it is possible to produce bag cloth with home-made tetron rayon yarn produced by flexible rapier looms, high-temperature, high-pressure roller dyeing machines, etc. manufactured with indigenous efforts and technology. He appreciated it as a proud success in building production processes with locally produced equipment.
					
					 After going round the rayon fabric shop, general weaving shop, general dyeing shop and other places, he gave important instructions to be implemented to manage and operate the mill including the issue of boosting the production of quality clothing materials and varieties of clothes such as cloth for school uniforms.
					
					 How nice to see the modern bag cloth production base built with locally manufactured equipment, he said, adding with a broad smile on his face that he felt satisfied and pleased when picturing to himself students going to and from school with cheerful laughter, carrying with them locally produced fashionable bags.
					
					 Noting that he was encouraged to see the mill operating in full capacity, he emphasized that the machines running to keep production at a high rate and the spirit of self-reliance displayed at the mill herald the victory of the revolution as they instill the conviction of sure victory and optimism into the people who will enjoy all blessings in the world in the near future and deal deadly sledge-hammer blows at the enemies working with bloodshot eyes to block the advance of the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the officials and employees of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the model mill in implementing the party's policies, would greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with great successes in production, keeping pace with the vibrant breath of the times.
					
					 He was accompanied by An Jong Su, Jo Yong Won and Pak Myong Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ju Chang Hyok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ju Chang Hyok
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of People's Artiste Ju Chang Hyok, vocal adviser of the Mansudae Art Troupe, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Macedonian President Hope for Korean People's Success in All Fields
articles.content:
Macedonian President Hope for Korean People's Success in All Fields
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador Cha Kon Il on Jan. 21 presented his credentials to Macedonian President Gjorgje Ivanov.
					 The president said that he sincerely wished the Korean people success in all fields under the guidance of the supreme leadership.

articles.title: C.C., GFTUK Meets
articles.content:
C.C., GFTUK Meets
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- There took place the 81st enlarged plenary meeting of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) here Thursday. 
					 The meeting discussed the issue of implementing to the letter the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address for 2016.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers underscored the need to conduct the organizational and political work to bring about greater miracles and innovations in work sites for a great surge, holding high the Party's militant slogan "Let us usher in a golden age in building a thriving nation in this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held!".
					
					 They called upon organizations and officials of the trade unions to boldly set goals of their units and arouse the members to the drive for hitting them and thus make positive contribution to glorifying the 7th Congress of the WPK as the congress of victors and glory.
					
					 The meeting was attended by members and alternate members of the C.C., the GFTUK and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas.

articles.title: Seminar Marks Founding Anniversary of Agricultural Workers' Union
articles.content:
Seminar Marks Founding Anniversary of Agricultural Workers' Union
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea.
					 Present at the seminar were officials concerned, officials of the union and agricultural workers.
					
					 Its participants heard papers dealing with ways of adding shine to the exploits performed by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in founding the union and developing it, and bringing about a fresh turn in its work under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the union, and other speakers said that the union whose origin was given in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle has successfully fulfilled its mission and duty on behalf of the era and revolution since its founding.
					
					 The road covered by the union is associated with the tireless efforts of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu who wisely led its work, attaching great importance to its development and role of the agricultural workers, they said.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Un's Songun leadership is a life of the union, they stressed that the union has rosy future for its development and the building of the socialist countryside when it remains true to the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They called for carrying out to the letter the party's policy of agricultural revolution under the uplifted banner of giving priority to self-development and thus making positive contributions to ushering in a golden age in building a thriving nation this year when the 7th Congress of the WPK is to be held.

articles.title: New Nutritive Fodder Additive Proves Successful
articles.content:
New Nutritive Fodder Additive Proves Successful
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The State Bacilli-Culture Institute under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK developed a new nutritive fodder additive for livestock.
					 It is made by means of fermenting agricultural and animal by-products.
					
					 Researchers of the institute succeeded in producing amino acid from animal by-products and settled several problems like the composition rate of fermentation organisms, method of their culture and production of substrates.
					
					 The additive is highly nutritious and capable of promoting enzyme activity and production of bioproducts, thus increasing the digestive and absorptive rate.
					
					 It has been applied to breeding swine, proving effective for raising immunity, cutting down fodder unit and boosting productivity.

articles.title: No One Can Deny Agreements Common to Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Can Deny Agreements Common to Nation: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The complicated history of the inter-Korean relations teaches a lesson that the north and the south can open the road to peace and reunification by their concerted efforts if they remain true to the three principles of the country's reunification and the north-south declarations but confrontation will escalate and a danger of war will increase if they violate and disobey them, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The present catastrophic phase of the inter-Korean relations is an inevitable result of the south Korean authorities' desperate efforts for the escalated confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with outside forces in defiance of the agreements common to the nation such as the three principles of the country's reunification and the north-south declarations, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Detente, peace and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations would be unthinkable without the three principles of the country's reunification, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 No one should stand against the three principles of the country's reunification and the north-south declarations. Those who dare oppose them are traitors and enemies of the reunification.
					
					 The three principles of the country's reunification and the north-south declarations should thoroughly be preserved and implemented until the day when the country is reunified.
					
					 To value the agreements common to the nation and carry on the dynamic struggle to implement them is the only just way of improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving the independent reunification in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 We should not pardon but resolutely punish the south Korean group of traitors who escalate the confrontation with compatriots and bring the disaster of a nuclear war against the north in collusion with outside forces, while going against the three principles of the country's reunification and the north-south declarations.

articles.title: Denuclearization of World Depends on U.S. Abandonment of Its Nuclear Weapons: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Denuclearization of World Depends on U.S. Abandonment of Its Nuclear Weapons: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Austrian newspaper Kronen－Zeitung, Reuters, AFP and other media criticized the U.S. for reneging on its commitment to building the "world without nuclear weapons".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article that such criticism is quite justifiable in view of the present grave situation.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 In order to denuclearize the world, it is, first of all, necessary for the U.S. to abandon huge nuclear weapons it stockpiled in its mainland and other places around the world.
					
					 Building the "world without nuclear weapons" is unthinkable without the denuclearization of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling realizing its wild ambition to dominate the world through an unchallenged nuclear edge after appeasing and deceiving several nuclear weapons states into disarming themselves.
					
					 Today the Korean Peninsula is a hotspot in the world.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear war maniacs who designated the DPRK as a target of their preemptive nuclear strike are threatening they would attack it without an advance notice.
					
					 It is needless to say that the U.S. is the arch criminal of the nuclear threat and the chieftain of arms race harassing peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S., the world's worst nuclear criminal, should not make a mockery of humankind with lies and deception.
					
					 As long as the U.S. blinded by the preponderance of nuclear weapons exits, the denuclearization of the world can never be realized.
					
					 Obama should abandon his Nobel Peace Prize though belatedly as he was awarded it for his whopping lies.

articles.title: Court's Judgment Rejected by S. Korean Newspaper
articles.content:
Court's Judgment Rejected by S. Korean Newspaper
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- An editorial denouncing unreasonable judgment a court of south Korea gave to Sin Sang Chol, former member of the joint investigation team into the sinking of warship "Cheonan" was posted on the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Jan. 26. 
					 The court at the trial sentenced him to eight months in prison with a two-year stay of execution for the mere reason that he deliberately criticized the then defense minister, though it dismissed all charges against Sin who was prosecuted for his articles claiming that the warship sank after running on a rock.
					
					 The editorial said that it was natural to chide the chiefs of the relevant ministry and departments when criticizing the "government", adding that writing articles accusing them can not be a crime.

articles.title: U.S. Official's Reckless Remarks Denounced by Organizations of Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
U.S. Official's Reckless Remarks Denounced by Organizations of Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Koreans in America including the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. and the People for Carving out Future held a meeting in front of the building of the federal government on January 23 denouncing the U.S. undersecretary of State for making the reckless remarks on the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 Speakers recalled that referring to the action of the Koreans in the U.S. against the "agreement" concluded between Japan and south Korea the U.S. undersecretary of State cried out for respecting the contents and the spirit of the agreement, touching off uproar.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to dismiss its undersecretary of State and demand the Japanese government reinvestigate the crimes related to the sexual slavery and make a formal apology and reparation for them.
					
					 The participants staged a demonstration at the end of the meeting.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Kuwait
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on Jan. 21.
					 Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from Jan. 21 to Feb. 16 and decided to give publicity to the exploits of Kim Jong Il and organize a seminar, lecture, film show and other various political and cultural events.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Benin
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Cotonou on Jan. 21. 
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Romania
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on Jan. 20.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to organize a seminar, film show and other political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il from Feb. 1 to 16 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) was formed in Moscow on Jan. 23.
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various political and cultural events praising the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the above-said anniversaries.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test Hailed by Organ of Venezuelan Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test Hailed by Organ of Venezuelan Political Party
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The second issue of Tribuna Popular, organ of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Venezuela, carried an article titled "The DPRK demonstrated its deterrent".
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in its first H-bomb test on Jan. 6, stunning the world.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, said that the DPRK's H-bomb test is a self-defensive measure for thoroughly defending the country's sovereignty and national right to existence from the danger of the U.S.-led imperialists' nuclear war and reliably ensuring peace in the Korean Peninsula and regional security.
					
					 The U.S. is prodding its followers into resorting to large-scale sanctions and conspiratorial "human rights" racket against the DPRK in a bid to check the DPRK's building of a thriving nation and improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 It is the DPRK's stand that there will be neither a halt to its nuclear development nor abandonment of its nuclear weapons unless the U.S. put an end to its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful First H-bomb Test Hailed by Nigerian Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful First H-bomb Test Hailed by Nigerian Political Party
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria sent a letter to the DPRK government on Jan. 20 in congratulation of the successful first H-bomb test of Juche Korea.
					 The letter said that the party received with pleasure the news that the DPRK succeeded in its first H-bomb test.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in its first H-bomb test, demonstrating its mightiness before the world.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the DPRK on its event to be handed down in its national history and express full support for the DPRK who is bolstering up its deterrent as an independent and sovereign state.
					
					 No country has the right of pulling up an independent and sovereign state over its bolstering up of its deterrent.
					
					 We extend full support once again to the DPRK's proposals for ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia including the proposal that if the U.S. suspends joint military drills the DPRK will put a moratorium on the nuclear test and the proposal for concluding a peace treaty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang.
					  Primero, el Mariscal vio diversas mochilas de escolares elaboradas con las telas producidas en la fabrica.
					
					  El Mariscal dijo que son muy bonitas las mochilas y agrego que estas pueden competir dignamente con los productos extranjeros en todos los aspectos como la diversidad de formas y color, la comodidad, la funcionalidad, la estetica, etc.
					
					  El Mariscal recorrio el proceso de produccion de telas para carteras, acondicionado ultimamente.
					
					   Apunto con satisfaccion que este proceso esta nacionalizado totalmente y es un proceso a estilo coreano deseado por el Partido.
					
					   Dijo que la fabrica preparo la capacidad de producir la tela para carteras con los domesticos hilos de rayon de tetron y con las maquinas de tejer con picas flexibles y las otras de tenir con rulo de alta temperatura y alta presion, manufacturadas con nuestras propias fuerzas y tecnicas. Esto deviene un exito loable en la nacionalizacion del proceso productivo.
					
					   Pasando revista a varios lugares como el taller de tela de rayon y los talleres combinados de tejer y tenir, el Mariscal dio valiosas instrucciones necesarias a la administracion y gestion de la fabrica incluyendo el problema de producir mucho mas las telas para uniformes de estudiantes y las otras de buena calidad.
					
					   Recalco que es muy bueno el hecho de que han acondicionado magnificamente la moderna y nacionalizada base de produccion de telas para carteras. Mostro una sonrisa amplia diciendo que se siente muy alegre si imagina el aspecto de los alumnos y ninos escolares que vayan a las escuelas llevandose las mochilas bonitas elaboradas en el pais.
					
					   Estoy muy animado al ver la fabrica que esta en pleno funcionamiento, acoto y prosiguio que los ruidos de la normalizacion de produccion, los del espiritu de apoyo en las propias fuerzas, son los sonidos del triunfo de la revolucion que le infunden la conviccion y el optimismo del triunfo al pueblo coreano, que se disfrutaran en los dias no lejanos de todos los beneficios del mundo, y constituyen los estampidos que dan un fuerte castigo a los enemigos que maniobran desesperadamente por bloquear el avance de la RPDC.
					
					   Expreso la esperanza y seguridad de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica, modelo de materializacion de la politica del Partido, concordaran el latido del corazon con la marcha vigorosa de la epoca y acogeran con grandes exitos de produccion el septimo Congreso del PTC.
					
					   El Mariscal fue acompanado por An Jong Su, Jo Yong Won y Pak Myong Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ju Chang Hyok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ju Chang Hyok
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 28 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Ju Chang Hyok, actor del Pueblo y asesor de musica vocal del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Presidente macedonio desea al pueblo coreano exito en todas las ramas
articles.content:
Presidente macedonio desea al pueblo coreano exito en todas las ramas
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Cha Gon Il presento al presidente macedonio Gjorgje Ivanov, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en ese pais europeo.
					 En la ocasion el presidente deseo de todo corazon que el pueblo coreano logre exitos en todas las ramas bajo la maxima Direccion.

articles.title: Efectuada reunion ampliada de 81a sesion plenaria de CC de FGSC
articles.content:
Efectuada reunion ampliada de 81a sesion plenaria de CC de FGSC
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en esta capital la reunion ampliada de la 81a sesion plenaria del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.
					En la ocasion fueron discutidos los temas para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo 2016.
					
					El presidente del CC de la FGSC, Ju Yong Gil pronuncio el informe y otros intervinieron.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que todas las organizaciones de FGSC deben librar energicamente las labores organizativas y politicas para crear mayores milagros e innovaciones en los campos por gran auge bajo la consigna combativa del partido "!Abramos una epoca de mayor esplendor para la construccion de un Estado poderoso y prospero en este ano en que se celebra el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea!".
					
					Subrayaron que en pleno acato al mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal, todas las organizaciones y los funcionarios de la FGSC deben trazar la ambiciosa meta de labor de sus respectivas unidades y llamar a todos los sindicalistas a la lucha por materializarla, haciendo asi activa contribucion a hacer del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea un conclave de gloria de los triunfadores.
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion los miembros y los suplentes del CC de la FGSC y los funcionarios de esta organizacion del centro y localidades.
